name: Goliath Juggernaut
text: You are a horrific and awe-inspiring sight on any battlefield. When working in mercenary units as a means to shatter an enemyâ€™s defensive line, you and your fellow juggernauts use a combination of brute strength and cunning tactics to crush anything in your path. Many armies have seen their shield-lines falter under the crushing cascade of goliath juggernauts and many commanders have come to fear your presence in any conflict.

features.rampagingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, if you hit with the attack you knock all enemies adjacent to one target you hit prone
features.warborn(11thLevel): Your maximum hit points increase by 10
features.battlefieldWarcry(16thLevel): Whenever you first become bloodied in an encounter, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn
